Plot: A womanizing art dealer and a painter find the serenity of their Riviera vacation disturbed by a third guest, a vivacious bohemian woman known for her long list of male conquests.
Title: The Collector
Writer: Patrick Bauchau (dialogue), Haydée Politoff (dialogue), Daniel Pommereulle (dialogue), Éric Rohmer
Actors: Patrick Bauchau, Haydée Politoff, Daniel Pommereulle, Alain Jouffroy
